item.title: REITNOUER MAXMISER TRAILERS v1.0 1.54-1.55.x ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 24, 2025

REITNOUER MAXMISER TRAILERS v1.0 1.54-1.55.x ATS

v1.0 Features:
Updated to ATS 1.54-1.55.x
Totally reworked to work with the new SCS cargo system.
Cargos adapted to new SCS cargo system.
Adjusted shadows.
Adjusted height.
Reworked some cargos.
Reworked lights & lightmasks.
Reworked some trailer textures.
Added traffic LOD model (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
New trailer logo.
Activated & reworked skins (ALL SKINS ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Added skins ui icons.
Some corrections on trailer defs files.
Added reflective stripes.
Improved locale files.
Added to trailers browser (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Added to freight market (all variants, cargos & skins) (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Added to traffic (all chassis, bodies, cargos & skins) (ONLY IN FULL VERSION).
Cargos updated to latest DLC’S.
Deleted innecessary files.
Other changes & minor corrections.

Credits: Cyrus, Corby, Dro Modding, B4RT Modding, Kyle ATS, KeithD.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: 113H Scania Bicuda v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 24, 2025

113H Scania Bicuda v1.0 ETS2

For ETS2 versions: 1.51.x | 1.52.x | 1.53.x | 1.54.x | 1.55.x
Mod Information:
Cabin animations;
Animated antennas;
Various power outputs and realistic sound.
Chassis: 4×2, 6×2, and 6×4, with or without liftable axles.
– 6 Steering Wheel Options: (Original Scania 113H);
– Floor Mat Options;
– Cab Upholstery Options;
– Camera can be rotated to the rear of the cab for a wider view;
– Luggage rack options;
– Options: Benches and beds;
– Cabin lights: Orange, Marajoara Blue, or White.
Tip: To turn on the cabin light, use the same button as the rotating beacon.
– Tank options: round, square, painted, or chrome;
– Battery box: Chrome, original black, or painted;
– Exhaust options;
– Designed based on the technical specifications of the original Scania 113H truck;
– Dashboard options: Black, Black with brushed steel, and wood.
– Original 113H paint jobs, custom paint jobs, and skins for you to edit, including: 6 Edite skins with normal paint and 6 Edite skins with metallic paint;
– Window and door handle animations;
– Front grille: Painted, normal matte, or chrome;
– Chassis options: 4×2, 6×2, 6×4, original, or lowered;
– Functional pedals: Animated accelerator and brake.
– Dashboard with animations on the functional buttons;
– PX Radio and Compressed Air: Springs with animations that move as the truck sways.
– Windshield options: Blue or Smoke Gradient.
– More realistic suspension added;
– Tinted or original rearview mirrors;
– Window gutter option;
– Animations on cargo hitches;
– Levers work for parking brakes and trailer brakes;

This Mod was created from real trucks brought from the streets to the game. It doesn’t replace the original trucks in the game, allowing both the 113H and 143H to expand your garage.

Credits: fabio contier

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Volvo Magro 2009 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 24, 2025

Volvo Magro 2009 v1.0 ETS2

The 2009 Volvo FH16, often referred to as the “Skinny Volvo” or “Classic Volvo” by Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) fans, is a very popular truck among players seeking a more traditional and realistic experience. It stands out for its iconic design and, when modified, can offer a variety of customization options.

What to expect from a 2009 Volvo FH16 mod in ETS2?
2009 Volvo FH16 mods generally aim to recreate the truck with as much detail as possible, including:
High-quality 3D modeling: Faithful reproduction of the cab, chassis, and exterior details.
Various customization options:
Cabs: Various cab options (Globetrotter, Globetrotter XL, etc.).
Chassis: Different axle configurations (4×2, 6×2, 6×4, 8×4), with or without air suspension.
Engines: Realistic engine options with the original power outputs of the 2009 FH16.
Transmissions: Gearboxes that simulate real-world performance.
Accessories: A wide range of accessories such as bumpers, headlights, taillights, grilles, tanks, exhausts, metallic paint, stickers, curtains, and even integrated GPS.
Realistic Sounds: Many mods come with engine and horn sounds recorded from real Volvo trucks, increasing immersion.
Improved Physics: Some mods include adjustments to the truck’s physics for more realistic handling, both on paved and dirt roads.

How to Install:
1. Download the Mod File: Most mods come in `.scs` format. Sometimes they come in a .zip or .rar file that needs to be extracted to reveal the .scs file(s).
2. Move the file to the “mod” folder: Go to your game’s documents folder. It’s usually located in `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`. Drag and drop the .scs file(s) into this folder.
3. Activate the mod in the game:
Open Euro Truck Simulator 2.
On the home screen, click “Mod Manager”.
Find the Volvo FH16 2009 mod in the list.
Double-click the mod icon to activate it (it will appear in the right column).
Click “Confirm Changes.”
You can now go to an in-game Volvo dealership to purchase the truck or modify it if you already have one.
Important: Always check the mod’s compatibility with your current version of ETS2. Older mods may not work on newer versions of the game, and vice versa, potentially causing crashes or bugs. Many mod creators update their work for the latest versions of the game.
If you have a specific version of the game in mind or a mod you’d like to see, let me know!

Credits: w beraldo

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MB 1620 JuniorGamer Rua Mods v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 24, 2025

MB 1620 JuniorGamer Rua Mods v1.0 ETS2

The “MB 1620 JuniorGamer Rua Mods” for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) is a highly sought-after mod by the Brazilian community, especially those who enjoy more classic, low-riding trucks. It’s known for offering a rich customization experience and a look reminiscent of the trucks that roam Brazilian roads.

Features of the MB 1620 JuniorGamer Rua Mods:
This Mercedes-Benz 1620 mod, developed or made available by channels such as “JuniorGamer Rua Mods” (and frequently shared by others, such as “Claudio Gamer Oficial” and “Vanderley Simulador”), typically includes:
Detailed Modeling: The truck is well-reproduced, with attention to both exterior and interior details.
Various Chassis Options: It’s common to find the 1620 with a variety of chassis, including “trucked” options (with more axles) and those that allow customization to lower the chassis, as is popular in Brazil.
Engines and Transmissions: Engine and gearbox options that simulate the performance of the original 1620, often with realistic “chip-like” sounds or characteristic roars.
Extensive Visual Customization:
Exterior Accessories: Bumpers (including the “mustache” design), headlights, taillights, exhaust tips (like the “boiadeiro” design), owls, PX antennas, beacons, and stickers (including those from “JuniorGamer” itself).
Interior: Custom seats, steering wheels, and even GPS options.
Paint Colors and Details: Possibility to choose from several colors, and sometimes, specific decals.
Invisible/Rigid Cargo: Many 1620 mods are designed to be rigid trucks (with a fixed body), and therefore, it’s common for them to come with or require the use of an invisible cargo mod to transport goods in the game. This allows you to place cargo directly on the truck’s bed.
Realistic Sounds: One of the highlights is the audio, with engine roars and horns that increase immersion.

How to Install:
1. Download the mod file: The mod usually comes in `.scs` format. If it’s in `.zip` or `.rar` format, you’ll need to extract it to get the `.scs` file(s).
2. Move to the “mod” folder: Paste the `.scs` file(s) into the `Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod` folder.
3. Activate the Mod Manager:
Open Euro Truck Simulator 2.
In the main menu, go to “Mod Manager”.
Find the “MB 1620 JuniorGamer Rua Mods” mod in the list (or whatever name the creator gave the file).
Double-click to activate it (it will move to the right column).
Click “Confirm Changes.”
4. Purchase the truck: In-game, go to a Mercedes-Benz dealership or a mod dealer (if there’s one specifically for mods you’ve activated) and look for the MB 1620.
Important tip: Always check the mod version’s compatibility with your game version. Outdated mods can cause crashes or bugs. Also, if the mod is for a rigid truck, look for an invisible cargo mod compatible with your version of ETS2 so you can use it with cargo.
Have you tried downloading this mod before, or do you have a specific version of ETS2 in mind?

Credits: marcos

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Macau wheel pack v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 24, 2025

Macau wheel pack v1.0 ETS2

When you talk about a “Macau Wheel Pack,” you’re probably referring to wheel mod packs for truck simulation games, such as Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2).

There are several content creators and modders who develop “wheel packs” to customize trucks and trailers in games. These packs typically include:
– Variety of models: Chrome, iron, Alcoa, Speedline wheels, with different designs, etc.
– Realistic tires: Rubber tires, with or without chains, and even with varying dirt finishes.
– Accessories: Hubcaps (with various spikes), lug nuts, and hubcaps.
– Compatibility: Many of these packs are updated for the latest versions of the games and are designed to be lightweight enough to work on different PC configurations.

How to use a wheel pack?
Typically, you download the pack file (which is usually in .scs format) and place it in your game’s “mod” folder (for example, `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`). Then, you need to activate the mod within the game’s mod manager.

If you’re looking for a specific “Macau Wheel Pack” or have any questions about installing or finding a mod, please let me know more details so I can help you more accurately!

Credits: paulo junior

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
